body: Dude/girl, if you don't like it, then why bother? This was just made for people who aren't into that, like you aren't into hetero relationship then you would want a gay hentai.
I HATE the gender bender in here because i love the SHOUNEN-AI original characters from the manga i hate when people change the gender of a character to make it be "normal"!!
This isn't gender bend though, or at least you don't see it in the story
